element.name: Extra Options
element.description: Some DMs may allow the use of extra options. Check this if your DM does.

description.p: You must have dragon, angel or some other winged creatures blood within your veins because you've sprouted wings. You gain the ability to sprout a pair of wings from your back (feathered, bat-like, anything of your choice), gaining a flying speed of 30ft. You can create these wings as a bonus action on your turn. They remain indefinitely until you dismiss them as a bonus action on your turn.

sheet.description: Your Flying Speed becomes 30ft., allowing you to fly in any direction.

description.p: You have spent years in the dark training your eyes to see without the use of light, you gain the following benefits:

ul.li: You gain the ability to see in darkness up to 60ft.
Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any Perception check you make.

sheet.description: You have spent years in the dark training your eyes to see without the use of light, you gain the ability to see in darkness up to 60ft.

description.p: Having spent years tinkering with all sorts of technilogical tools and devices along with things of the arcane nature, you have gained the ability to create magically enchanced weapons and armor. You can add your Intelligence and Proficiency modifiers to any roll made with your Tinker's Tools when creating a weapon or armor. You must state to the DM whether you are making a weapon or armor along with a rough idea of what the item's enchantment should be. The DM sets a DC and has the final say as to how accurate your creation process was.

sheet.description: You can add your Intelligence and Proficiency modifiers to any roll made with your Tinker's Tools when creating a weapon or armor.

description.p: If you deal fire damage to a creature or flammable object, it starts burning. At the start of each of its turns, a creature burning in this way takes 1d6 fire damage. A creature that can reach the burning target can use an action to extinguish the fire.

description.p: At 1st level, your draconic bloodline has heightened your senses making you more alert to your surroundings and giving you an inate ability to see through people.

ul.li: You gain proficiency in Perception and Insight.
You gain the ability to see in darkness within 60ft.

description.p: At 5th level, your senses have become more alert and are even more aware of those around you.

ul.li: Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any Perception or Insight check you make.

description.p: At 1st level, your divine blood has heightened your senses making you one with nature and more alert to your surroundings.

ul.li: You gain proficiency in Perception and Nature.
You gain the ability to see in darkness within 60ft.

description.p: At 5th level, your senses have become more alert and are even more attuned to the world around you.

ul.li: Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any Perception or Nature check you make.
